title: Pafos Hard Enduro Training Day
description: Technical climbs, descents, switchbacks and line choice with section practice and coaching.

title: PMC Winter Scramble
description: Friendly race format with separate classes. Perfect for first-timers and experienced racers.

title: Adventure Ride to Troodos
description: Mixed road and off-road loop to Troodos with coffee and lunch stops. Big bikes welcome.
